Plot: Rameez and Soni were inseparable but fate pulled them apart. Years later they run into each other. He is a family man, she is a divorcee. As they struggle to reconnect, old flames are rekindled.
Title: Flame
Writer: Rajesh Naroth (story), Rajesh Naroth, Krishand R K
Actors: Deergha Sahni, Tanish Chandraprakash, Sonu Bains, Priya Pillai
